Articles.Content:
challenge ideas:

  • build a very large space station above kerbin and crash-land it down to ksc(destroying the plane hangar and the rest of ksc)
  • do the same thing to the face on duna
  • try and blow up the magic rock with BD armory mod
  • use hyper edit and cause tylo to go into low kerbin orbit
  • send the cater crawler to duna without using cheats

plz post pictures of the results if you try any of these challenges!

 

Edited June 12, 2016 by GALACTIC_SUN101
Welcome to the forums! If you want to post challenges, read this OP. It helps a lot.
